parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 1st Person Singular
str2: To have, hold, possess. Including an alternate form scheo skheh'-o; a primary verb; to hold.
From chairo; graciousness, of manner or act.
A deity, especially the supreme Divinity; figuratively, a magistrate; by Hebraism, very.

parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Dative Masculine Singular
str2: Who, which, what, that.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 1st Person Singular
str2: To serve, especially God, perhaps simply: I worship. From latris; to minister, i.e. Render religious homage.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.
Clean.
The conscience, a persisting notion. From a prolonged form of suneido; co-perception, i.e. Moral consciousness.
From, away from. A primary particle; 'off, ' i.e. Away, in various senses.
An ancestor. From proginomai; an ancestor, parent.
Probably adverb of comparative from hos; which how, i.e. In that manner.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 1st Person Singular
str2: To have, hold, possess. Including an alternate form scheo skheh'-o; a primary verb; to hold.
Unceasing, unremitting. Unintermitted, i.e. Permanent.
Remembrance, recollection, mention; commemoration. From mnaomai or mimnesko; recollection; by implication, recital.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 2nd Person Singular
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
The night, night-time. A primary word; 'night'.
And, even, also, namely.
A day, the period from sunrise to sunset.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 1st Person Singular
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.
Supplication, prayer, entreaty. From deomai; a petition.
